Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Nandao wo meiyou wei ni er kaita ni de xiongjin ma
Wo xie xiale ni de zhongren
jishi ni de bei danfuguo zhong de
yu jian nan xiangban de, que shi rongyi
yu jian nan xiangban de, que shi rongyi
dang ni de shiwu wanbi shi
ni yingdang qinlao, ni yingdang xiang ni de zhu kenqiu
